remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个标准绑定都提供用于控制传输安全性要求的参数。Each of the standard bindings provides parameters for controlling the transfer security requirements. 这些参数通常包括指定是使用消息级安全性还是使用传输级安全性的安全模式，还包括客户端凭据类型的选项。These parameters typically include the security mode that specified whether message-level or transport-level security is used and the choice of client credential type. 基于这些参数提供的可供选择的选项，构建一个具有适当安全性的信道堆栈。Based on the choice of options these parameters present, a channel stack is constructed with appropriate security. [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 提供的由系统提供的绑定是一组旨在满足一些最常见方案要求的绑定。The system-provided bindings supplied by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] are a set designed to meet some of the most common scenario requirements. 所有这些绑定都允许为某些特定的目标方案指定安全要求。Each of these bindings allows the specification of security requirements for some specific targeted scenarios. 为 提供安全规范。 provides the security specifications for . 这是一种适合于跨计算机通信的安全、可靠且进行了优化的绑定。This is a secure, reliable, optimized binding suitable for cross-machine communication. 默认情况下，它生成运行时通信堆栈，该堆栈支持使用 TCP 进行消息传递、通过 Windows 安全性实现消息安全性和身份验证、通过 WS-ReliableMessaging 实现可靠性以及进行二进制消息编码。By default it generates a run-time communication stack that supports TCP for message delivery and Windows Security for message security and authentication, WS-ReliableMessaging for reliability, and binary message encoding. 此类由 进行实例化，且可通过称为 的只读属性访问。This class is instantiated by the , and can be accessed by a read-only property called . 因为此属性为只读，因此您将无法更改返回的对象。Because this property is read-only you cannot make changes to the returned object. 如果要控制 对象的创建，则您可以从 派生一个类。If you want to control the creation of the object, you can derive a class from . ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何从 中检索 对象，并输出它所包含的各种设置：The following code shows how to retrieve the object from a and prints out the various settings it contains: [!code-csharp[S_UE_TcpSecurity#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_tcpsecurity/cs/service.cs#0)]
